Package eea.engine.component.render

This package provides the concrete implementation for renderable components.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AnimationRenderComponent An AnimationRenderComponent is a renderable (displayable) component that can be animated with a given animation speed.
ImageRenderComponent A RenderComponent that is represented by an image
 

Package eea.engine.component.render Description

This package provides the concrete implementation for renderable components. Currently, the two following types are supported:

  • A AnimationRenderComponent shows a succession of images at a given speed (e.g., for displaying an explosion or the movement of a body)
  • A ImageRenderComponent shows a simple component represented by an image that is adapted based on the current scale and rotation values.
